metadata.Title: CVE-2017-0317 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: All versions of NVIDIA GPU and GeForce Experience installer contain a vulnerability where it fails to set proper permissions on the package extraction path thus allowing a non-privileged user to tamper with the extracted files, potentially leading to escalation of privileges via code execution.

criterions.comment: nvidia-graphics-drivers-173: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
